user_story: As a user, I want to seamlessly enter a virtual reality mode from the main interface to freely explore lunar football stadiums and their infrastructure, experiencing a science-fiction inspired lunar environment, so that I can feel fully immersed in a futuristic setting.
acceptance_criteria: ["A clearly labeled 'Enter VR Mode' button is present and accessible from the main interface.", 'Upon entering VR mode, the user can freely navigate (walk, look around) within at least one lunar football stadium and its immediate infrastructure (including seating, tunnels, and control rooms).', 'All visuals and interactive elements (such as doors, seats, and control panels) reflect a lunar, science-fiction inspired ambiance, including low gravity effects, futuristic materials, and visible lunar surface through windows or openings.', 'The VR experience maintains a minimum of 60 FPS on supported devices (Oculus Quest 2 and above) with no major frame drops or crashes during a continuous 10-minute exploration session.', 'The user can exit VR mode at any time via a clearly labeled option and is returned to the main interface without loss of progress or application instability.']

user_story: As a user, I want the main (non-VR) interface to be intuitive, visually captivating, and inspired by science-fiction design, so that my experience is unique, engaging, and easy to navigate, regardless of VR or ambiance settings. This story focuses solely on the main interface and excludes VR and ambiance-specific elements.
acceptance_criteria: ['The main interface (excluding VR and ambiance-specific screens) uses a consistent science-fiction inspired color palette, typography, and iconography across all screens.', 'Navigation menus and key actions (booking, exploring, viewing matches) are clearly labeled and accessible within two taps or clicks from the home screen.', 'First-time users can complete a basic task (e.g., booking or exploring) without external help, as verified by a usability test with at least 5 participants.', 'All animations and transitions are smooth (under 300ms) and do not block or delay user actions.', 'A minimum of three unique, visually engaging UI elements (e.g., animated backgrounds, futuristic buttons, or interactive cards) are present on the main screens.']

user_story: As a user, I want the application's ambiance in the standard (non-VR) interface to be inspired by science fiction (e.g., 'The Martian'), so that the environment feels authentic and immersive throughout my experience.
acceptance_criteria: ['All primary screens in the standard (non-VR) interface (home, dashboard, settings, and gameplay) use a consistent lunar, sci-fi visual theme, including color palette, backgrounds, and icons.', 'Background music is present on all main screens in the standard interface and is thematically consistent with a science fiction/lunar setting.', 'At least three unique sound effects (e.g., button clicks, notifications, transitions) are implemented and match the sci-fi theme in the standard interface.', 'No screen or user journey in the standard interface contains visual or audio elements that break the established sci-fi theme.', 'A QA tester can verify the presence and consistency of the theme by navigating through all user journeys in the standard interface and confirming the above points.']

user_story: As a user, I want to book tickets for lunar football matches through a streamlined process, so that I can secure my spot quickly and without hassle.
acceptance_criteria: ['The booking process (from match selection to confirmation) can be completed in under 3 minutes under normal network conditions.', 'Users can select a match from a list of upcoming lunar football matches.', 'Users can select available seats for the chosen match, with unavailable seats clearly indicated.', 'Users can choose from at least two payment methods (e.g., credit card, lunar credits).', 'A booking confirmation (with match details, seat number, and payment summary) is displayed immediately after successful payment.', 'If any step fails, the user receives a clear error message and can retry or return to the previous step.', 'The booking flow is accessible on both desktop and mobile devices.']

user_story: As a user, I want to see personalized ticket offers and event recommendations on the reservation page, based on my preferences and past purchases, so that I can easily find relevant events and seating options.
acceptance_criteria: ["The reservation page displays at least three personalized ticket offers or event recommendations tailored to the user's profile and purchase history, if such data exists.", "Personalized seating options are suggested based on the user's previous selections and stated preferences, if available.", "A toggle or setting to enable or disable personalized recommendations is available in the user's profile or preferences page.", 'When the user disables personalized recommendations, no personalized offers or suggestions are shown on the reservation page.', 'Personalized offers and recommendations update within 5 seconds after a change in user preferences or purchase history, if the underlying data is available.']

user_story: As a customer (family, business, or individual), I want to select my group type during the booking process so that I am presented with packages and seating arrangements tailored to my needs, including any relevant discounts or amenities.
acceptance_criteria: ['The booking interface provides a clear option for users to select their customer segment: family, business, or individual.', 'Upon segment selection, only packages and seating options relevant to the chosen segment are displayed to the user.', 'If special group discounts or amenities are available for the selected segment, they are clearly shown alongside the relevant options.', "If no special discounts or amenities are available for the selected segment, the user is informed with a clear message (e.g., 'No special discounts available for this segment').", 'The selection and display process functions consistently and responsively across both desktop and mobile devices.', "All displayed options and messages are localized according to the user's language preference."]

user_story: As a loyal customer, I want to view my loyalty program status and points, and redeem them for discounts or exclusive offers directly during the reservation process, so that I can maximize my benefits while booking.
acceptance_criteria: ["After logging in, the reservation page displays the user's loyalty program tier and current points balance.", 'The user can choose to redeem available points for a discount, and the discount amount is immediately reflected in the booking summary before payment.', 'Exclusive offers or benefits for loyalty members are clearly labeled and can be selected during the reservation process.', 'If the user does not have enough points to redeem, the redemption option is disabled and an explanatory message is shown.', 'Any changes to loyalty options (points redemption, offer selection) update the reservation summary in real time.', 'All loyalty-related actions (viewing status, redeeming points, selecting offers) are available and functional on both desktop and mobile versions of the reservation page.']

user_story: As a user, I want all data transmissions between the client and server to be encrypted using TLS 1.3 or higher, so that my personal and financial data is protected during transfer and I can trust the application with my sensitive information.
acceptance_criteria: ['All data transmissions between the client and server must use TLS 1.3 or higher.', 'Attempts to connect using lower versions of TLS or unencrypted protocols are rejected by the server.', 'A security test report demonstrates that no data is transmitted in plaintext between client and server.', 'Automated tests are in place to verify that only TLS 1.3 or higher is accepted for all endpoints.']

user_story: As a user, I want the application to process my ticket purchases and reservation transactions securely and reliably, so I can complete these actions without fear of fraud or errors.
acceptance_criteria: ['All payment processing must comply with PCI DSS standards, as verified by a compliance checklist and/or audit report.', 'Multi-factor authentication (MFA) is required for all purchases and account changes, and users are prompted for MFA during these actions.', 'All transactions (purchases and reservations) are logged with user ID, timestamp, transaction amount, and status, and logs are accessible to authorized admin users for auditing.', 'After each successful transaction, the user receives an on-screen confirmation and an email receipt with transaction details (amount, date/time, items purchased/reserved).']

user_story: As a user, I want the application to maintain consistent performance and availability during high-traffic events, so I can enjoy a seamless and uninterrupted experience.
acceptance_criteria: ['The system must support at least 10,000 simultaneous users without observable performance degradation, as measured by load testing tools.', '95% of user actions (e.g., page loads, form submissions) must have a response time under 2 seconds during simulated peak load conditions.', 'A documented disaster recovery and failover plan must be available and reviewed by the team.']

user_story: As a user, I want to be able to enable and manage two-factor authentication (2FA) on my account, so that I can add an extra layer of security to protect my personal information and reservations.
acceptance_criteria: ['Users can enable or disable 2FA from the account security settings page.', 'When enabling 2FA, users can choose between an authenticator app (TOTP) or SMS as the second factor.', 'Upon enabling 2FA, users must complete the setup and verify the second factor before 2FA is activated.', 'If 2FA is enabled, users are required to provide the second factor during login after entering their password.', 'Users receive a confirmation email when 2FA is enabled or disabled on their account.', 'If a user loses access to their 2FA method, they can request a recovery process via email.']

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to monitor system health and performance in real time through a dashboard, receive automated alerts for abnormal behavior, and access centralized, searchable logs and historical performance data, so I can proactively address issues before they impact users.
acceptance_criteria: ['A real-time dashboard displays key performance metrics (CPU usage, memory usage, response times) for all monitored servers, updating at least every 10 seconds.', 'Automated alerts are sent via email and SMS when predefined thresholds for CPU, memory, or response times are exceeded. Thresholds must be configurable by the administrator.', 'System logs from all monitored servers are centralized in a single, searchable interface, with new logs accessible within 1 minute of generation.', 'Historical performance data is retained and accessible for at least 90 days, with the ability to view and export trend reports for any selected time range.', 'All features are accessible via the admin portal with role-based access control.']

user_story: As a system architect, I want the application to support automated horizontal and vertical scaling so that it can handle a 10x increase in concurrent users without performance degradation or downtime. This will ensure the system remains reliable and performant as user demand grows rapidly, supporting business continuity and user satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: ['The system can support a 10x increase in concurrent users (from current baseline) without downtime, as verified by load testing in a staging environment.', 'Under maximum load, average response time does not exceed 500ms and throughput remains above 95% of baseline performance, as measured by automated performance tests.', 'Automated scaling (both horizontal and vertical) is implemented, and scaling events are triggered and verified in a staging environment.', 'System health and scaling events are logged and can be monitored via the dashboard, with clear documentation on how to access and interpret these logs.', 'A rollback plan for scaling failures is documented, and a rollback scenario is tested and verified in staging.']

user_story: As a product manager, I want the platform to support the integration of new features and services through a modular architecture, so that the application can quickly adapt to evolving user needs and technological advancements without impacting existing functionality.
acceptance_criteria: ['The platform codebase is refactored to use a modular structure, enabling new features to be added as independent modules or plugins.', 'Comprehensive documentation is provided, detailing the process for creating, integrating, and deploying new modules, including code structure and integration points.', 'A feature toggle system is implemented, allowing new features to be enabled or disabled at runtime without code changes or redeployment.', 'Adding a new feature module does not require changes to existing modules, except at explicitly documented integration points.', 'A sample new feature module is created, integrated, and demonstrated, with automated regression tests confirming no impact on existing functionality.']

user_story: As a user, I want the application to support zero-downtime deployments, so that my experience is not interrupted during updates or maintenance.
acceptance_criteria: ['The deployment process enables updates to be released without causing any user-facing service interruptions, as verified by monitoring logs and user reports.', 'Automated and manual tests confirm that users can access all core features during and after deployment.', 'Performance monitoring tools are in place to track application response times and error rates before, during, and after deployments.', 'A tested rollback mechanism exists, allowing the system to revert to the previous stable version within 5 minutes if issues are detected during deployment.', 'All prerequisites for scalable and modular architecture are met, or this story is implemented after those dependencies are resolved.']

user_story: As an educator or curious user, I want to access an interactive educational section about space exploration and technology challenges, so I can better understand the context of lunar football.
acceptance_criteria: ["An 'Educational' section is accessible from the main interface via a clearly labeled button or menu item.", 'The section contains at least three types of interactive content: one quiz, one simulation, and one video related to space exploration and technology challenges.', 'Content in the educational section can be updated by administrators through a content management interface, without requiring a full application redeployment.', 'User engagement (including time spent, content completed, and quiz scores) is tracked and stored for analytics purposes.', 'The educational section is responsive and fully functional on both desktop and mobile devices.']

user_story: As a user, I want the lunar football application's login feature to function seamlessly on the latest versions of iOS, Android, and Windows mobile operating systems, as well as on the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers, so that I can access my account from any device I choose.
acceptance_criteria: ['The login feature loads and allows successful authentication on the latest versions of iOS, Android, and Windows mobile devices.', 'The login feature loads and allows successful authentication on the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers on both desktop and mobile.', 'No critical login-related features (e.g., password reset, error messages) are missing or broken on any supported platform or browser, as verified by a cross-platform compatibility checklist.', 'Any platform-specific login issues are documented and have clear workarounds or are scheduled for resolution.']

user_story: As a user with special needs, I want every image in the application to have descriptive and appropriate alt text, so that I can understand the content and context of images when using assistive technologies.
acceptance_criteria: ['Every image in the application includes an alt attribute.', 'Alt text accurately describes the image\'s content or function, or is empty (alt="") for purely decorative images.', 'Alt text is concise (no more than 125 characters) and does not duplicate adjacent or surrounding text.', 'Alt text is reviewed and validated for accuracy and relevance through both manual review and automated accessibility tools (e.g., axe, Lighthouse).', 'No image fails automated accessibility checks related to alt text.']

user_story: As a user, I want to access 24/7 technical support directly from the application interface, so that I can get timely help and resolve issues at any time without leaving the app.
acceptance_criteria: ['At least one support channel (chat, email, or phone) is available 24/7 from within the application interface.', 'Users can initiate a support request via the chosen channel without leaving the application.', 'A response is received within the defined SLA: 5 minutes for chat, 1 hour for email, and 10 minutes for phone calls.', 'A confirmation message is displayed to the user after submitting a support request, indicating the expected response time.', 'Support channel availability and response times are logged for audit and monitoring purposes.']
